document_data.name: Damian Krale
document_data.mainbody: '''Damian Krale''' was a worshiper of [[Shar]] who was tasked by the Mistress of the Night to unite cells dedicated to her worship throughout the [[Western Heartlands]]. The ultimate goal of his endeavours was mostly a secret and only a few of the leaders of the cells knew what it was.
document_data.Physical appearance: Krale was a massive man with a booming voice, both of which served to enhance the force of his impressive personality.
document_data.Possessions: In battle Damian wielded [[Shadowstone]], an enchanted [[heavy mace]] that was also a minor artifact created by Shar.
